message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to offer it to you at a special price of $12,000. I believe this is a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a competitive price. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,500. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still out of my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $9,000.  This is my final offer.

I understand that $10,500 is still a bit too high for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. I'll sell the product to you for $9,750. This is my best and final offer.
